group_1.textLeft: Alright! Now we're gonna go fishing!
This is where we'll catch our lunch.

group_1.textRight: Huh?! But I've never even been fishing before!
Hang on, Charu! This isn't one of the attractions we@picked!

group_1.textLeft: If we want to bring out the true appeal of the village,
I don't think just showing people the sights will cut it.

group_1.textRight: But...this is too sudden. I didn't even bring any@fishing gear.

group_1.textLeft: I guess we'll need Shizuka to catch us a lot of fish...

group_1.textRight: Alright...I guess I'm left with no other choice!

group_1.textLeft: Huh...?
Here you go! I made enough poles for three people.

group_1.textRight: Is this...a fishing rod?

group_1.textLeft: It's just a tree branch that's easy to hold, with some fishing wire attached to the end.
It doesn't look like much, but it'll catch fish for sure.
Hup!
......[wait:0.8][chara:102501:cheek_0][chara:102501:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json:motion_200][chara:102501:lipSynch_1]There!

group_1.textRight: Wait, what?! You already caught one?!

group_1.textLeft: Yep!

group_1.textRight: Woah!
I'd like to try, too.

group_1.textLeft: Sure, go ahead!
[chara:800700:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Haha! I caught so many fish!

group_1.textRight: But you didn't catch 'em all by yourself, Dad,@you had help the entire time.

group_1.textLeft: Urgh...I suppose...

group_1.textCenter: This will be my first time having freshly caught fish.

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle*
Ah! Sunao, take a look at that!
Aren't these one of the wild vegetables you showed@us the other day?

group_1.textRight: Ah...those are—

group_1.textLeft: And this one...oh, and here's another one!
*Chuckle*
With enough experience, it's pretty easy to tell@which ones are edible or not!
Here, you guys pick some, too!

group_1.textRight: What? What am I supposed to do...?

group_1.textLeft: Come on, let me show you!

group_1.textRight: Um...allow me to take these plants off your hands,@Charu.
And if you'd like, I can teach you all how to harvest@vegetables.

group_1.textLeft: Thanks, Sunao!@[chara:102601:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:102601:cheek_0][chara:102601:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json:motion_200][chara:102601:lipSynch_1][chara:102601:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Alright, let's get a big haul!
Sunao...those are poisonous...

group_1.textRight: Yes...that was a very close call...

group_1.textLeft: Alright! We've returned to the village!

group_1.textRight: *Sigh* That was a fun day, but I feel so tired now@that we're back...
Same here...
Hoo...my back is killing me.

group_1.textLeft: All right, we'll make you guys a big lunch.
Sunao, you're on!

group_1.textRight: Yes, I hope this will make you all feel refreshed and@restored.
I'll make you lunch using all the fresh things we've@collected.

group_1.textLeft: Me too!
I think we're on our way down the golden route@this time!
This is...delicious!

group_1.textCenter: These boiled vegetables have a nice bitter taste.

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* Thank you very much.

group_1.textRight: The eggs on rice are super good!

group_1.textLeft: Those eggs were laid just this morning!

group_1.textRight: And...these persimmons! They're so sweet and@delicious.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, we call those things “daidaikko”.
It seems like it's not really a persimmon, but...maybe@it's some kind of relative?

group_1.textRight: Hmm?
This village is pretty isolated from the others, isn't it?

group_1.textLeft: Yes.

group_1.textRight: Then it's possible that these “daidaikkos”...
...are some kind of fruit that's adapted to the specific@climate of this village.

group_1.textLeft: So that means they're unique to our village?

group_1.textRight: That could be another attraction for us.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, you're right!
